welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bee Ridge, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport houses both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Venice Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Venice Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
